mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_file ( file_url, file_size) VALUES ( #{fileUrl}, #{fileSize})
INSERT INTO video ( user_id, title, detail_contents, created_at, updated_at, like_count, bad_count, hits) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{detailContents}, now(), now(), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT v.user_id "userId", v.title, v.detail_contents "detailContents", v.updated_at "updatedAt", v.like_count "likeCount", v.bad_count "badCount", v.hits, vf.file_url "fileUrl" FROM video v, video_file vf WHERE v.id=#{id} and vf.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_like ( video_id, user_id, is_liked) VALUES ( #{videoId}, #{userId}, ${isLiked})
